title: Small Repairs
headline: A repair service designed to simplify home maintenance outside the summer season
intro: Easily book your small repair service and let our team assess your needs, organize and coordinate every step of the process. We take care of every detail from the initial evaluation to final completion, ensuring smooth and efficient management.

personalSpace.title: Your dedicated client space
personalSpace.description: A chat is available within your client space to structure all communication needed:
points: Your tracking of the ongoing work

preRequest.title: Pre-request
preRequest.text: Fill out the dedicated form with all required information about the work.

validation.title: Pre-request validation
validation.text: Our team reviews your request and may contact you through the dedicated space if needed.

payment.title: Service fee payment
payment.text: Proceed with payment of fees covering logistics, including key delivery.

keyReception.title: Key reception
keyReception.text: We receive your keys and schedule a visit to evaluate the work.

technicalVisit.title: Technical evaluation
technicalVisit.text: A technical visit is carried out to assess the feasibility and cost of the repairs.

quote.title: Custom quote
quote.text: Receive a detailed quote you can approve directly from your client area.

execution.title: Work execution
execution.text: Once the quote is approved and paid, the work begins under our teamâ€™s supervision.

completion.title: Completion
completion.text: After work is completed, we return your keys along with a final report.

commitment.title: Strict Adherence to Our Service Charter
commitment.text: At Sahel, we strictly adhere to our internal service charter to ensure top-quality service. This document outlines all the procedures we apply to each intervention for consistent and impeccable results. From using eco-friendly products to secure access handling, deadlines, and client follow-up, every part of our work is held to rigorous standards. This ensures a professional service that meets your expectations and gives you peace of mind.
